markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 340 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Ashava](/Deities.aspx?ID=466), [Hshurha](/Deities.aspx?ID=689), [Il’Surrish](/Deities.aspx?ID=538), [Monad](/Deities.aspx?ID=541), [Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575), [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=618), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=443)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target transforms into a vaporous state. In this state, the target is amorphous. It loses any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and it uses its proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. It gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15) or [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The target can Dismiss the spell.
name: Gaseous Form

<traits>
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 340 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Ashava](/Deities.aspx?ID=466), [Hshurha](/Deities.aspx?ID=689), [Il’Surrish](/Deities.aspx?ID=538), [Monad](/Deities.aspx?ID=541), [Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575), [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=618), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=443)

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

---

<summary>
Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.
</summary>
summary: Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.
summary_markdown: Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.
text: Gaseous Form Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 340 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Deities Ashava, Hshurha, Il’Surrish, Monad, Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice), Ragdya, Zura Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 willing creature Duration 5 minutes --- The target transforms into a vaporous state. In this state, the target is amorphous. It loses any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and it uses its proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. It gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The target can Dismiss the spell.
